definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Innovative application of advanced technology makes possible many of the P600's new features.
sentences.chinese: 先进技术革命性的应用使P600具有许多新的特性。
这项发明革命性地推动了眼科学的发展。

sentences.english: What digital camera bring revolutionary character.
sentences.chinese: 数字相机带来的的便利是革命性的。

sentences.english: The technologically advanced thermogenic blend is the most powerful diet pill formula every made.
sentences.chinese: 这一革命性的减肥产品是目前市场上最有效的。

sentences.english: "With the nail polish there was something edgy or revolutionary, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 她说，“指甲油的那些命名是先锋性和革命性的。”

sentences.english: This requires revolutionary improvements in clean technology, say the authors.
sentences.chinese: 这组作者说，这就需要清洁技术的革命性改进。

sentences.english: Maybe not quite as revolutionary as the computer,but close.
sentences.chinese: 也许它的革命性不及电脑，但很接近。

sentences.english: Simple as it sounds, the Gaia Hypothesis is a revolutionary idea.
sentences.chinese: 尽管它听起来简单，盖亚假设是一项革命性的理论。

sentences.english: What to rich guest is not overthrown and replace, not cloggy also its revolutionary meaning.
sentences.chinese: 博客不推翻和替代什么，也不妨碍它的革命性意义。

sentences.english: 610 0 This is a revolutionary new product.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种革命性的新产品。

sentences.english: What was revolutionary about, or innovative, ? about Hobbes' political science?
sentences.chinese: 关于霍布斯的政治科学，到底什么是革命性的呢？

sentences.english: A revolutionary, new multi-shot ECD from TASER International.
sentences.chinese: 一种革命性的，新的多射门Taser国际创意总监。

sentences.english: It is a kind of revolutionary impact to old arranging the methods of the lesson.
sentences.chinese: 它对旧的排课方式方法是一种革命性的冲击。

sentences.english: This fully reflects the revolutionary bourgeoisie with the compromise.
sentences.chinese: 这充分体现了资产阶级的革命性与妥协性。

sentences.english: The kind of rap Tupac used was revolutionary.
sentences.chinese: 图帕克的一种说唱用的是革命性的。

sentences.english: Online has indeed been revolutionary - and in the strict sense of the word.
sentences.chinese: Online在严格意义上的确是革命性的。

definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to topple (i.e. knock over)/to capsize/fig. to overturn (a regime, by plotting or subversion)/to undermine/to subvert
